message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think you'd be very interested in. I'm asking for $120 for it. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $100 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price. Would you be willing to meet me at $110?  I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I'm still not able to go above $100 for the product. I hope we can find a mutual agreement.
